author: Staff Reporter
text:
The State Election Commission is mulling the introduction of electronic voting machines in the 2016 local body elections, according to P. Seetharaman, State Election Commissioner.

Addressing at a consultative meeting at the Collectorate here on Wednesday, Mr. Seetharaman said that using the ‘multiple-post-single-choice’ mode in the EVMs, a voter could press a button to select candidates for multiple posts.

Such EVMs would be used in all rural polling booths under the Melpuram panchayat union in Kanyakumari district on a pilot basis.

Collector Sajjansingh R. Chavan. Project Director, DRDA, T. Getzi Leema Amalini and Personal Assistant to Collector (Development) Bathhoo Mohamed Nazeer participated in the meeting.
title: EVMS to be used for local body polls on a pilot basis
